alert.note: Alert for Ozaukee; Sheboygan (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued September 11 at 9:06AM CDT until September 12 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Life threatening waves of 4 to 8 feet and dangerous currents are expected. * WHERE...Beaches along Lake Michigan in Sheboygan, and Ozaukee counties. * WHEN...Through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming conditions are expected due to high waves and onshore winds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Several beaches that will be most susceptible to the dangerous swimming conditions include Vollrath Park in Sheboygan... Blue Harbor Beach in Sheboygan... North Beach in Port Washington...
info.instruction: Stay out of the water and away from dangerous areas like piers and breakwalls. Strong structural and longshore currents are expected. Rip currents are possible.
